content.raw:
nop doesn't work. 
The qtpy function in suspect is supposed to be used on every instance of qheaderview.
But it's not that big of a issue as I noticed that the line that needed adjustment because of this was a line of mine and nothing from the labscript main branch.

Also you can always try catch this stuff or use QT_ENV to figure out what to do.

nop doesn't work. The qtpy function in suspect is supposed to be used on every instance of qheaderview. But it's not that big of a issue as I noticed that the line that needed adjustment because of this was a line of mine and nothing from the labscript main branch.

Also you can always try catch this stuff or use QT_ENV to figure out what to do.
